mapper.select: select ima021,rvb01,rvb02,rvb05,rvb051,rvb90,rvb04,rvb03,rvb07,rvb10t,rvb88t,rvbplant,qty from ${centre}.rvb_file left join ${centre}.ima_file on ima01 = rvb05 left join (select sum(IQTY) qty,CDANHAO,CPRODUCENO from TC_WDF_FILE group by CDANHAO,CPRODUCENO) t on t.CDANHAO = rvb01 and CPRODUCENO = rvb05 where rvb01 = #{code_1} order by rvb02
